name: Last Hope (itch) (PnDAA)
description:
Game Controls

wasdm, zqsd, or directional arrows to move.

Right click (or space) on those to absorb the monster power.

Note that a right click costs a **heart**!

Goal

You need to collect all three ameliorations of each special monster to complete the game:

- Spitters give you piercing bullets.

- Dogs give you movespeed.

- Big monsters give you one heart slot.

Everything else should be self-explanatory. Don't hesitate to post comment if anything is not understandable or for good or bad critic.

Have fun!
